name: OrdiMutants
description: The OrdiMutants is a collection of mutants native to the bitcoin blockchain. OrdiMutants is inscribed using parent/child provenance making the collection verifiable on chain. Under the hood of every mutant inscription, you will find a historical rare satoshi. The project is run by a community of ordinal OGs and the main focus is to onboard people to bitcoin, teach newbies how to inscribe, and educate people about rare sats. Follow the X account for more information.
